ABOUT_CONDITION_1: As a user I want ability to register in the system by entering full name, e-mail and password(no e-mail confirmations are required).
ABOUT_CONDITION_2: As a user I want to login to the system with my e-mail and password.
ABOUT_CONDITION_3: As a user I want to see list of tasks created by me or assigned to me
ABOUT_CONDITION_4: As a user I want to be able to create new task by entering task title, description and due date
ABOUT_CONDITION_5: As a user I want to be able to assign task to one or more other users
ABOUT_CONDITION_6: As a user I want to be able to change task status assigned to me (NOT DONE, IN PROGRESS, DONE)
ABOUT_CONDITION_7: As a user I want to be able to see near due or overdue tasks highlighted in my task list
ABOUT_CONDITION_8: As a user I want to be able to filter task list by assignees, statuses or overdue
ABOUT_CONDITION_9: As a user I want to be able to delete tasks from list
